video.title: Unsere Mütter, unsere Väter
video.synopsis: Five young friends meet in Berlin in 1941, but it may be their last time together as the events of World War II tear them apart.

episodes.synopsis: Berlin 1941: five friends say goodbye and will try to see each other once the war is over. They have no idea how much their lives will have changed.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Two years later, Wilhelm, Friedhelm, and Charlotte are at the Eastern Front. Greta is a singer and her Jewish friend Viktor fears for his life.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Greta has been arrested, Charlotte has been seized by the Russians, and Friedhelm and Viktor are facing each other. The war's over but is it really?
episodes.title: Episode 3
